body:

replies.body:
You people...
The EULA is around to stop pay2win servers, are you going to disagree with that? It is shutting down the money guzzling YouTube servers that give Minecraft a bad name. There's no need to call it 'stupid' or 'bullshit' when it is prolonging the life of the game you all enjoy.

The EULA is the best addition to this game in quite a while.
